intro: BOP IT! TWIST IT! PULL IT! The same great game, now featuring pulse-pounding music, far-out backgrounds, and global leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to stay in the game?
description:
It’s finally here: Bop It! The Video Game.

Featuring the classic Bop It! gameplay: follow the commands to BOP IT, TWIST IT, PULL IT and stay in the game.

The animated backgrounds, Shapes, City, Space, and Office may look cute but don’t let those happy aliens and goldfish distract you! One glance the other way and it’s game over! “Ooooh so close!”

Each original song gets faster and faster… and even faster the longer you stay in the game. Do you have what it takes? “Focus. Concentrate.”

Once you’ve gotten comfortable with CLASSIC, give EXTREME a try and add SPIN IT and FLICK IT to the mix. It’s only two more commands, why is it so much harder? “Ehhhhh! Try again!”

Think you’re good? See how you stack up against the world on the Global Leaderboards, beat your buddies on the Friends Leaderboards, and log new high scores on your Local Leaderboard. “You’re on fiyaaaa!”

Are you better than your friends? Prove it with local multiplayer. 
	- Go head-to-head in One-on-One
	- See who drops the streak first in Pass It.
	- Compare your session scores in Party Mode
	- “Hot Bop It! action!”

Earn stickers to decorate your notebook with each in-game achievement. “Reflexes of a jungle cat!”

Think you can stay in forever? Great – because the best part of Bop It! The Video Game is that the levels never end: as long as you can stay in, the game will keep going. “Look at you! Rockin’ the Bop It!”
